Thought you folk here might be interested in checking out my Java
HalBuilde=
r library that I just released to Maven Central last night:

http://theoryi=
npractise.tumblr.com/post/17847472256/halbuilder-1-0-1-released
https://git=
hub.com/talios/halbuilder

The library deals with generating, and consuming=
 HAL based representations
and navigating the parsed representations.  The =
library itself doesn't deal
with HTTP or any specific REST/Web framework so=
 should be useable from
pretty much anything.

Mark

-- 
"Great artists are=
 extremely selfish and arrogant things" =E2=80=94 Steven Wilson,
Porcupine =
Tree
